articles.title: Cardinals sign former Texas Tech WR Dylan Cantrell, list him as TE - Arizona Sports
articles.description: The Arizona Cardinals have signed former Texas Tech wide receiver Dylan Cantrell, who played for Kliff Kingsbury. He is listed as a tight end.
articles.content:
The Arizona Cardinals have signed former Los Angeles Chargers wide receiver Dylan Cantrell, the team announced Monday. In the release, the Cardinals listed him as a tight end.
